Output State. Related parameters defined in output and touch settings parameter data.
Animation State. Related parameters defined in Four State Full Logic/Multicolor parameter data.
Job Input for Four State Full Logic mode.
Factory Reset is now in progress!
Defines the sensitivity of the touch button. High sensitivity will allow easier actuation. Low sensitivity will prevent false actuation.
When defined as normally open, the output is active with a touch input. When defined as normally closed, the output is inactive with a touch input.
In Momentary mode, output is active only while the button is touched. In Latching mode, output is activate each time the button is pressed.
A leading edge delay is triggered on the rising edge of a touch input. A trailing edge delay is triggered on a the falling edge of a touch input.
Prevents the touch input from activating the output.
Length of time the touch button needs to be pressed to trigger 'touch active' state.
Length of time before the device returns to 'touch inactive' state after button is released.
The speed of the Animation/Vibration Feedback
Value describing the LED position of the device. LED state defined in parameter data.
Value describing the LED position of the device. LED states defined in process data.
Defines the LED location that the sequence animation is initiated at.
The main color of the Animation, Custom Colors are defined in Parameter data
The Intensity of Color 1, Custom Intensity defined in Parameter Data
The secondary color of the Animation, Custom Colors are defined in Parameter data
The Intensity of Color 2, Custom Intensity defined in Parameter Data
Set custom intensity to be used
Set custom flash rate to be used
Turn on to show more consistent colors from device to device
Defines the color of the designated LED. LED 1 is oriented at the 12 O'clock position
Defines the color of the designated LED
Defines the intensity of the designated LED
